attributes.action: Arrest Joseph Kony leader of of the LRA
attributes.additional_details:
As a mother myself i cant believe so many people in power are ignoring this issue.
Joseph Kony is number 1 on Americas most wanted war criminals list. His goal is to Abduct children, train the young boys to be soldiers and killers. To use the young girls as sex slaves. Why? Just so he can keep his power and only for that reason. I want to help raise the issue and ask for our Governments help to stop this. Kony has been free to do this for 26 years. Sign to help Arrest and disarm the LRA
